text: Park Sa-rang (born March 4, 2003) is a South Korean actress. Park began her career as a child actress, and has starred in television series and films such as A Happy Woman (2007), Bestseller (2010) and Grand Prix (2010). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" style="width:550px" |- ! width=10|Year !
